forum.title: Who was the most influential ruler in ancient history?
forum.content: There are many great rulers in history like Alexander the Great, Julius Caesar, and Ashoka. Who do you think had the biggest impact?

replies.content: I think Qin Shi Huang was incredibly influential. He united China and built the Great Wall!
Ashoka's role in spreading Buddhism globally was massive. His reign shaped many cultures.

forum.title: What were the real causes of the fall of the Roman Empire?
forum.content: I've read about economic decline, military issues, and invasions. But what do you think was the biggest factor?

replies.content: I think internal corruption and political instability weakened the empire from within.
Don't forget the economic struggles! Heavy taxation and inflation played a huge role.

forum.title: Which revolution changed history the most?
forum.content: The French Revolution, American Revolution, or the Industrial Revolution? Which one had the most lasting impact?
